text: but we proclaim a crucified Christ: an offense to Jews, foolishness to Greeks.To the Jews, their Messiah would be a conquering king, and since death on a cross was viewed as a curse (Deuteronomy 21:23, Galatians 3:13), a crucified Messiah was simply unthinkable. What did the Greeks want with someone else's Messiah, especially a dead oneâ€”sheer nonsense!
